units.title: Pool PSC lines before organoid generation
units.text: we pooled PSC lines (5,000 cells per line) before organoid generation
units.rationale: Describes the initial cell pooling step for mosaic organoid creation.

units.title: Generate individual CBOs and pool post‑dissociation
units.text: CBOs were generated individually from the PSC lines and pooled equal amounts of cells per line after organoid dissociation for single-cell library preparation
units.rationale: Details the downstream multiplexing workflow after organoid dissociation.

units.title: Immunofluorescence characterization of mCBOs
units.text: we first characterized mCBOs by immunofluorescence for canonical markers of neurodevelopment previously defined for organoids
units.rationale: Specifies the assay used to assess neurodevelopmental marker expression.

units.title: Assess proliferation via flow cytometry
units.text: we used a two-pronged approach. First, we longitudinally assessed the proliferation rate of organoids derived from individual lines in two differentiation replicates through flow cytometry-based cell cycle analysis
units.rationale: Provides a method for measuring proliferative dynamics across lines.

units.title: Develop and apply SCanSNP deconvolution
units.text: we set out to develop a new method, SCanSNP (Fig. 3a), to overcome the observed limitations by (1) dividing the classification challenge into two steps, one for identity assignment and one for doublet detection and (2) measuring the genetic purity of each droplet to identify low-quality droplets and separate them from authentic doublets
units.rationale: Outlines the computational pipeline for genotype‑based cell identity assignment.

units.title: Re‑run demultiplexing with all algorithms
units.text: Next, we performed demultiplexing again using all the above algorithms
units.rationale: Ensures comprehensive evaluation of demultiplexing tools on the same dataset.

units.title: Longitudinal imaging of PSC line growth rates
units.text: we undertook an in-depth profiling of the growth rate of 12 different PSC lines by systematic and longitudinal imaging over different passages during pluripotency maintenance and at multiple time points during CBO differentiation
units.rationale: Captures growth dynamics to inform mosaic balance and scalability.

units.title: Monte Carlo simulation for scalability modeling
units.text: we used a Monte Carlo simulation with two initial parameters: (1) the starting number of PSC lines used to generate mCBOs and (2) the minimum number of cells per line required for single-cell analysis
units.rationale: Models how line number and cell input affect recoverable profiles.

units.title: Pseudotime trajectory reconstruction
units.text: we leveraged partition-based graph abstraction (PAGA; dpt; Fig. 5c and Extended Data Fig. 6d) and isolated all biologically relevant lineages upon downsampling cells per genotype to ensure balance
units.rationale: Describes the analytical steps for building developmental trajectories.

units.title: Allele‑specific expression (ASE) analysis
units.text: we took advantage of our multigenotype dataset to detect loci with allelic-specific genetic variants could be linked to the neurodevelopmental traits expression (ASE)
units.rationale: Identifies a strategy to connect genotype to transcriptional phenotypes.
